context_for_next_agent.market_theme: Technology-driven growth with AI infrastructure investment, banking sector resilience amid higher interest rates, and defensive rotation into utilities amid global uncertainty
context_for_next_agent.user_alignment: All three recommended sectors (Technology, Finance, Utilities) match user's stated sector preferences - perfect alignment
context_for_next_agent.portfolio_approach: Growth + Income + Defensive blend suitable for medium risk tolerance and 12-month horizon

warnings: Technology sector valuation at slight premium (P/E 22x vs 5-year avg 18x) - monitor for multiple compression risk
Global economic uncertainty could reverse capital flows - recommend diversification across all three sectors rather than concentration
Currency volatility (USD/MYR) could impact Technology sector export competitiveness
next_agent_instructions: Identify 5-10 high-quality companies distributed across Technology, Finance, and Utilities sectors. Prioritize companies showing: (1) Strong relative strength vs sector index, (2) Institutional accumulation patterns, (3) Solid fundamentals (earnings growth, ROE >12%, healthy balance sheet), (4) Adequate liquidity for RM50,000 portfolio deployment, (5) Favorable risk-reward at current valuations. Ensure representation from all three sectors with slight overweight to Technology and Finance given stronger capital inflow dynamics.
